feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud VPN

entry.content:
Cloud VPN is now available in region asia-southeast3 (Bangkok, Thailand). For more information, see Global locations.

Pricing is available on the Cloud VPN pricing page.
entry.summary: Cloud VPN is now available in asia-southeast3 (Bangkok, Thailand). This expansion provides users in the region with secure and reliable connectivity options. For more details on pricing and global locations, please refer to the documentation.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud VPN expands to Asia Southeast 3

entry.content:
Cloud VPN provides predefined dashboards in the Google Cloud console for a quick, single-view insight into system health and tunnel performance. These dashboards display key metrics that enable you to monitor project-wide health and conduct tunnel-specific diagnosis without manual configuration. This feature is Generally Available.

For more information, see View Monitoring dashboards
entry.summary: Predefined dashboards are now available in the Google Cloud console for Cloud VPN. Get a single-view insight into system health and tunnel performance, enabling quick monitoring and diagnosis without manual configuration.
entry.title: Feature: VPN dashboards available now

entry.content:
Cloud VPN supports customizable cipher options for your VPN tunnels. You can configure ciphers as per your security requirements. This feature is Generally Available.

For more information, see Configure ciphers in Cloud VPN tunnel.
entry.summary: Cloud VPN now supports customizable cipher options for your VPN tunnels, allowing you to configure ciphers according to your specific security needs. This feature is Generally Available.
entry.title: Feature: Customizable Cipher Options for Cloud VPN

entry.content:
Classic VPN full deprecation update

As of August 1, 2025, dynamic routing or Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) for Classic VPN tunnels is deprecated. If your workloads require BGP for VPN connectivity, you must use HA VPN.

Existing Classic VPN tunnels that use BGP will continue to function. However, they will no longer be supported and will operate without an availability SLA.

For more information, refer to Classic VPN dynamic routing deprecation.
entry.summary: Classic VPN BGP support ends August 1, 2025. Use HA VPN for dynamic routing.
entry.title: Deprecated: Classic VPN Deprecation Update
